interestingFact: Japan has more than 6,800 islands and is home to the world's oldest company, which operated for over 1,400 years.
Brazil is the only country in South America that speaks Portuguese.
Canada has the longest coastline in the world, stretching over 202,000 km.
India is the world's largest democracy and the birthplace of chess and yoga.
Australia is home to more kangaroos than people.
Switzerland has not been in a war since 1815 and is known for its neutrality.
Egypt is home to the only remaining ancient wonder of the world — the Great Pyramid of Giza.
China is the world's most populous country and has the world's largest high-speed rail network.
